name: Githyanki Warbrace (Astral Dragon)
reqAttune: by a creature with Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma greater than or equal to 15
entries: This combination Armbrace and belt depicts the visage of a grand astral dragon with amethyst inlays. This brace was once made for elite warriors of Vlaakith, but have since been lost or are not in production, although it is still possible to create new ones with materials from various planes of existence.
This item was blessed through Vlaakith, and she would not want this to be muddled in any other way. You cannot combine this item.
As an action, you can activate this brace and gain the following benefits:

items: You gain a bonus to AC equal to your (Intelligence/Wisdom/Charisma) modifier
Your walking speed increases by 10 feet
You gain advantage on Acrobatics Checks
You gain a bonus equal to your Constitution saving throw for maintaining concentration on spells equal to your (Intelligence/Wisdom/Charisma) Ability modifier

entries: When you activate this brace, roll 1d3, on a 1 you use your Intelligence modifier, on a 2 you use your Wisdom Modifier, and on a 3 you use your Charisma modifier
This effect lasts for 1 minute. At the end of its activation, you gain 1 level of exhaustion and are stunned for a 1 turn.
The brace can be activated in this way 3 times and you regain 1 use per long rest. You cannot end this effect early.
If the attuning creature has access to Psionic Energy Dice, the Telekinetic Feat, or the Telepathic Feat, they gain access to the following ability:
Astral Blade: When you attack with a weapon while the Warbrace is active, your attacks are considered magical and can add 1d8 Force damage once per turn.
